uk.co.jdpatrick.JEngine.Particle

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.jdpatrick.JEngine.Particle.Particle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BloodParticle

    public abstract class Particle
extends java.lang.Object
    A Particle object, override to create unique particles.
    Author:
    Jack Patrick

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected org.newdawn.slick.geom.Shape particle
      The shape of the particle, used for rendering.
      protected java.util.Random random
      The Random to use to decide movement.
      protected int time
      How many ticks the Particle has been alive for.
      protected int x
      Integer X position of the Particle, used for rendering.
      protected double xa
      X and Y velocity values, added to xx and yy every tick.
      protected double xx
      Double position of the Particle, used to keep track of position until rendering, where the Integer versions are used.
      protected int y
      Integer Y position of the Particle, used for rendering.
      protected double ya
      X and Y velocity values, added to xx and yy every tick.
      protected double yy
      Double position of the Particle, used to keep track of position until rendering, where the Integer versions are used.
